data.title: Mayfair Theatre
data.meta_description: June 18th and 19th – part of the Scorsese / De Niro Film Festival screening throughout June! A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him. Oscar nominee:…
data.text:
June 18th and 19th – part of the Scorsese / De Niro Film Festival screening throughout June!

A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.
